title: Lost Cricket Ball
transcript: is playing Cricket he took a ball or someone took a ball and they apparently borrowed it from the owner and they've lost it so what to do they have to give it back physically or something similar to it because when you take something and you borrow it then it is in your protection and you take it as a loan if it's gone if it's uh uh uh burnt or whatever you have to return it physic Al or something that is equivalent to it
